lead_paragraph: Two veteran Republican speechwriters had created a draft last month. But inside Trump Tower, it turned out, Ms. Trump began tearing it apart.

byline.contributor: Yamiche Alcindor, Nicholas Confessore and Ashley Parker contributed reporting.
byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and MICHAEL BARBARO

headline.print_headline: How Melania Trump Sent Speech Veering Off Course
headline.main: How Melania Trump’s Speech Veered Off Course and Caused an Uproar

snippet: Two veteran Republican speechwriters had created a draft last month. But inside Trump Tower, it turned out, Ms. Trump began tearing it apart....
abstract: Melania Trump sets off uproar at Republican National Convention by delivering speech containing phrases seemingly lifted from Michelle Obama's speech at 2008 Democratic National Convention, incident that overshadowed much of action surrounding husband Donald Trump's nomination; embarrassing blunder appears to be result of lack of oversight and Melania's determination to tear apart speech by professional writers and make it her own.
